title: Agathangelos Tsiripidis
text: Agathangelos Tsiripidis (born 4 May 1963) is a Greek <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201996%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Bantamweight">men's bantamweight</a> event at the <a href="1996%20Summer%20Olympics">1996 Summer Olympics</a>.
